answers.answer: I would try just putting my feet up for a while. Maybe a hour or 2 and see of it helps. If not call your dr!
Thats what my grandmother said too

question: Im just wondering i had preeclampsia with my daughter and had her at 28 1/2 weeks and they told me i was fine with my pregnancy now but my all swollen should i call my dr now or just put my feet up?
